short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically open specific websites at scheduled times: daily, weekly, monthly, or custom.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you forget to perform actions on specific websites at regular intervals?
With Scheduler Extension, you can schedule any website to open automatically at your desired time—daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, or even at specific time.

Features:
Flexible Scheduling: Set specific times to open websites automatically—daily, weekly, monthly, or annually.
Custom Reminders: Schedule actions for websites so you never miss important tasks.
Easy to Use: Add websites to your schedule in just a few clicks.
Persistent Storage: Your scheduled tasks are saved and won't be lost if you restart your browser.
Automatic Alerts: Open websites as per your schedule using Chrome's alarm and storage APIs.

Example Use Cases:
Schedule bill payment websites to open monthly.
Remind yourself to visit project management tools every morning.
Open annual subscription renewal sites automatically.
Access your email dashboard at specific times of the day.

Install now and make your browser work for you!
